@PosenIzzy I know it’s terrible, it does seem he has lost it. Very sad because he was one my favourite commentators. 

Not just the conspiratorial nature of his posts but the desperation, bitterness and ferocity which I don’t remember being there beforehand.
@yatteit Why not take this further? Why did he join an extremist Islamist organisation in the first place? Extremist thinking is clearly deeply embedded within him.
@Ben_said_it No. He was recently "let go of" or something like that

@PosenIzzy The problem with him is that he went through real oppression and torture in various middle Eastern countries. It seems to have traumatised him and it certainly contributed to his distrust of media and government, as evidenced by his sudden insanity in response to covid measures.
@PosenIzzy I use to love Maajid so much. But this insanity is really depressing.
@PosenIzzy Sad. Does he still have a show on LBC?

He's now completely detached from reality, living an alternative existence, blocking out all voices that might wake him up. Many of us still love him and just want to nudge him back to reality, but he blocks all critical voices. Now he's parroting Russian conspiracies. https://t.co/pdTO5L1COo
